channel.title: Realm of Demons (RoD) - BETA - Eco Based - 24/7 Dedicated Server - Custom Core
channel.description:
[center] Logo to go here - currently being made!
OUR WEBSITE IS NOT COMPLETED SO IF IT LOOKS BAD I'M SORRY HAHA
[url=http://realmofdemons.com/client.html]Webclient[/url]
[url=http://realmofdemons.com/rod2.jar]Desktop Client[/url]
[url=http://realmofdemons.com]Check Out Our Homepage - Logo Still Being Designed[/url]
[url=http://www.realmofdemons.com/forums]Register on Our Forums[/url]
Overall Summary:
A friend wanted to start a server again and he offered me a shot at developing once more as I was retired. So, I gathered up my courage and going to try it again. (y). I am a no none-sense type of person so yeah. Several of my friends have been testing the server thus far and they all enjoy it so I have decided to let it go public for further development.
Credits:
-Sanity (of course!) -Monster (For being sexy cause we are using his most recent release <3 ) -Loveandpower (A lot of content already added/rewritten!) -The Wanderer (New Core, content)
Donations:
We are not donations base, and we don't even have a donation system yet however we do plan to add one just for you lovely people who enjoy to help to contribute!
GFX Designers:
We are currently looking for some so if you are looking for some extra money hit me up at eddieconnerrsps (skype) , and [email]eddieconner@live.com[/email] (msn).
Development Team:
We have a broad range of developers on this server below are but a few:
-Loveandpower - Content/Forum Manager -The Wanderer - Paid Content Developer -Penor - Paid Client Developer (future and part time)
Other Information:
Please keep in mind that this IS a server that is in DEVELOPMENT. This means that not everything is done yet and that we will be doing items in line of importance. Unlike most servers though we are more than willing to listen to your ideas and take your feedback for additions to the server. We have several ideas that are currently being designed before being implemented so we are always looking for more plot bunnies!
Media:
Please keep in mind I don't consider myself a "gfx person" so until we get a good designer just bare with the horrible pictures ;) I will crop these after I get advertisement out![/CENTER]

[/quote]like client backgrounds? L be more specific, more details sounds interested

client background could work, but they would be displayed in game… like a store. At the store if you unlock a “chick” u can go and view her photo…[/quote]or even better, a puzzle that you could do (sort of like treasure trail puzzle ) of naked females :hurr: I like idea will talk with paul
